author: Don Reisinger
title: How to mitigate mild symptoms of COVID-19 at home, according to doctors
description: Most people who are sick with COVID-19 have mild symptoms and are advised to stay home and take the time to recover. Doctors recommend Tylenol to manage any fever, fluids to stay hydrated, lots of rest, and above-all-else self-isolation. Also, track your symp…
content:
You're feeling ill. And now, the test has come back positive: You have COVID-19. 
It's an increasingly common occurrence worldwide. As of right now, there are no drugs that have been clinically proven to lessen the severity or speed up recovery time of COVID… [+2254 chars]
